pkgmetadata.longdescription: High Dimensional Bayesian Ridge Regression without MCMC // The svd(singular value decomposition) or qr decomposition was using for the implementation, this avoid the recursion optimizing the time in the compute https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xJw 7gM5_XiJipQ3grTZkfc6q4K0hzuCx?usp=sharing.
